Comments: this medication has several uses. My anxiety level was lowered and I am able to get to sleep easier. Being a antihistamine it also allows me to wake up breathing better. and to add it lowers my blood pressure.

Side Effects: After just a few days on this drug I had to stop taking it. I was taking it in combonation with a drug that made me drowsy. So I just felt so physically tired and mentally awake. It was the worst feeling ever.

Comments: This is a really good drug to add when a patient needs to take an opiate.  The all over the body itching that many people get as a side effect was totally eliminated.  I think this drug should be better known for this property and prescribed more often.

Side Effects: I was drowsy when I took it_ so I took it at bedtime. Then I found I could tolerate it in the daytime as I continued to take it for sinus allergies_ and gave me a somewhat anti anxiety effect.
Comments: I like this medication and use it 50mg 3 times a day. I am normally very agitated and shaky person_ from some nerve damage in my head. Vistaril is a wonderful for allergies_ I don't get sleepy and have little or no anxiety problems now.

Side Effects: I have Lupus and have no immune system and I also have chronic bronchitis.  Hydroxyzine Pamoate affected my breathing.
Comments: Maybe it should be contraindicated in someone like me that has chronic bronchitis.

Side Effects: Still foggy & depressed_ but I absolutely CAN'T have a panic attack.
Comments: It was great for panic attacks (and allergies_ hah)
